other_tests.findings: Profound hearing loss on the left side and moderately severe mixed conductive and sensorineural hearing loss on the right side.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Fluctuations in hearing with overall progressive deterioration; steroid treatment was unsuccessful.

other_tests.procedure_name: CT scan of the temporal bone
other_tests.findings: Thickened but undermineralized bone in a bilateral symmetric distribution, extensive involvement around the cochleae, vestibules, and semicircular canals, with obliteration of the oval windows.
Enhancement of the fundus of the distal internal auditory canals and of the bones around the cochleae, vestibules, and semicircular canals bilaterally. No mass lesion is seen.

other_tests.procedure_name: Conventional radiograph of the tibia and fibula
other_tests.findings: Multiple healed fractures of the tibia, an un-united fracture deformity of the middle fibular shaft, and gracile osteoporotic bones.
